author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...COMPACT HURRICANE HENRIETTE CONTINUES NORTHWESTWARD WELL NORTH OF HAWAII...
summary: ...COMPACT HURRICANE HENRIETTE CONTINUES NORTHWESTWARD WELL NORTH OF HAWAII... As of 5:00 PM HST Mon Aug 11 the center of Henriette was located near 30.8, -159.0 with movement NW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 987 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...COMPACT HURRICANE HENRIETTE CONTINUES NORTHWESTWARD WELL NORTH OF HAWAII... As of 5:00 PM HST Mon Aug 11 the center of Henriette was located near 30.8, -159.0 with movement NW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 987 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Henriette (CP3/EP082025)
